query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NOT NULL THEN p.id END) as products_with_category,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN pc.productId IS NULL THEN p.id END) as products_without_category
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON p.id = pc.productId;
